text: Guasila (Guasìba, Guasìlla) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 2,676 people lived there. Its area is 43.51 km². It is 210 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia
title: Guasila
